name: Duck Game

task.description: Setting version to XP for default...
task.name: set_regedit

content:
game:
  appid: 312530
  arch: win32
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: true
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    arch: win32
    description: Installing .net
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xna40
    arch: win32
    description: Installing xna
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dinput
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Dinput
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting version to XP for default...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $CACHE/prefix
    value: winxp
system:
  disable_monitoring: true
